Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Fetuses were obtained by a Cesarean section and examined for external , visceral , and skeletal alterations .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| external alterations |
| visceral alterations |

The "Disease" entities in the paragraph are "external alterations" and "visceral alterations". These are changes or abnormalities in the external and visceral (internal organs) structure of the fetuses being examined. The term "skeletal alterations" is not included in the table as it is not a disease, but rather a type of alteration being examined.

| external alterations |
| visceral alterations |

The "Disease" entities in the paragraph are "external alterations" and "visceral alterations". These are changes or abnormalities in the external and visceral (internal organs) structure of the fetuses being examined. The term "alterations" is not included in the table as it is too broad and does not clearly refer to a disease.
